attributes.action: increase the age of voting to 21
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at a time when young adults are expected to show more compassion about their futures, shouldn't we spend the time between 18 and 21 educating them so they take an active part in politics. This would see an end to voting apathy at a time when more young people vote for Big Brother than their future leaders.
